name: TypescriptCourse
description: 1. Comand for init tsc config    ```        tsc --init    ``` 2. Compilation    ```        tsc src/name.ts    ``` 3. See result    ```        node src/name.js    ``` 4. See result with tsc config    ```        tsc --watch src/name.ts    ``` 5. Compilation all arquivos    ```       tsc --watch    ```
